SELECT B_SEQ, USER_ID, U_NAME, U_EMAIL, U_NICKNAME, B_TITLE, B_CONTENT, B_READ_CNT, REG_DATE, B_GROUP, B_ORDER, B_INDENT FROM( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, B_SEQ, USER_ID, U_NAME, U_EMAIL, U_NICKNAME, B_TITLE, B_CONTENT, B_READ_CNT, REG_DATE, B_GROUP, B_ORDER, B_INDENT FROM( SELECT A.B_SEQ AS B_SEQ, A.USER_ID AS USER_ID, NVL(B.U_NAME, '') AS U_NAME, NVL(B.U_EMAIL, '') AS U_EMAIL, NVL(B.U_NICKNAME, '') AS U_NICKNAME, NVL(A.B_TITLE, '') AS B_TITLE, NVL(A.B_CONTENT, '') AS B_CONTENT, NVL(A.B_READ_CNT, 0) AS B_READ_CNT, NVL(TO_CHAR(A.REG_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD'),'') AS REG_DATE, NVL(A.B_GROUP, 0) AS B_GROUP, NVL(A.B_ORDER, 0) AS B_ORDER, NVL(A.B_INDENT, 0) AS B_INDENT FROM WD_FBOARD A, WD_USER B WHERE A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID
AND B.U_NICKNAME LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
AND A.B_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
AND DBMS_LOB.INSTR(A.B_CONTENT, #{searchValue}) > 0
ORDER BY B_SEQ ASC)) WHERE RNUM >= #{startRow} AND RNUM <= #{endRow}

SELECT COUNT(B_SEQ) AS CNT FROM WD_FBOARD F, WD_USER U WHERE F.USER_ID = U.USER_ID
AND U.U_NICKNAME LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
AND F.B_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} ||'%'
AND DBMS_LOB.INSTR(F.B_CONTENT, #{searchValue}) > 0

SELECT A.B_SEQ AS B_SEQ, A.USER_ID AS USER_ID, NVL(B.U_EMAIL, '') AS U_EMAIL, NVL(B.U_NICKNAME, '') AS U_NICKNAME, NVL(A.B_TITLE, '') AS B_TITLE, NVL(A.B_CONTENT, '') AS B_CONTENT, NVL(A.B_READ_CNT, '') AS B_READ_CNT, NVL(TO_CHAR(A.REG_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS'), '') AS REG_DATE, NVL(A.B_GROUP, 0) AS B_GROUP, NVL(A.B_ORDER, 0) AS B_ORDER, NVL(A.B_INDENT, 0) AS B_INDENT FROM WD_FBOARD A, WD_USER B WHERE B_SEQ = #{value} AND A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID
mapper.update: UPDATE WD_FBOARD SET B_READ_CNT = B_READ_CNT + 1 WHERE B_SEQ = #{value}
